Author: junebug-2019
Text: The physical pain and fatigue that is present in the beginning of recovery does go away in time. My physical symptoms took 2.5 months to go away but they comeback if I do not eat my meal plan for more than a day.

Author: sixteen_sosweet
Text: You will have to fight for it, but eventually you will reach a point where the ED voice is just a whisper that you can ignore and focus on what you really need. Body changes are hard but the end result will be worth it. Think of all the positives of being recovered, such as being able to focus on things you enjoy rather than food and body image. You got this!!
